Key Match Events: Indonesia was 'robbed' of a win due to controversial referee decisions, resulting in a 2-2 draw.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A similar case occurred during the 2016 World Cup Qualifiers, in a match between South Africa and Senegal for the 2018 World Cup.
Others: The extended injury time given by referee Al Kaf allowed Bahrain to score an equalizer in the 90+9th minute.
